SMETHAcknowledgementController.name: SMETHAcknowledgementController
SMETHAcknowledgementController.description: SMETHAcknowledgementController class sends acknowledgement responses for nominal missive requests

SMETHAddressBookController.name: SMETHAddressBookController
SMETHAddressBookController.description: SMETHAddressBookController adds SEPAmail specific fields to the Thunderbird Address Book

SMETHAttachmentController.name: SMETHAttachmentController
SMETHAttachmentController.description: SMETHAttachmentController class listens to missive attachment UI events and responds to user actions

SMETHAutomaticAcknowledgementController.name: SMETHAutomaticAcknowledgementController
SMETHAutomaticAcknowledgementController.description: SMETHAutomaticAcknowledgementController manages the sending of automatic acknowledgements

SMETHComposeMessageController.name: SMETHComposeMessageController
SMETHComposeMessageController.description: SMETHComposeMessageController class defines all the events that is related to "SMETHComposeMessageView"

SMETHExportController.name: SMETHExportController
SMETHExportController.description: SMETHExportController allows to export a SEPAmail message

SMETHHeaderController.name: SMETHHeaderController
SMETHHeaderController.description: SMETHHeaderController initialise the sepamail header UI

SMETHMessageListController.name: SMETHMessageListController
SMETHMessageListController.description: SMETHMessageListController manages the appearance of SEPAmail messages in the message list pane

SMETHOptionController.name: SMETHOptionController
SMETHOptionController.description: SMETHOptionController class defines all the events that is related to "SMETHOptionView"

SMETHRawContentController.name: SMETHRawContentController
SMETHRawContentController.description:
SMETHRawContentController handles the displaying of SEPAmail messages in raw mode, that is, displaying the content of
the XML document that defines a SEPAmail message.

SMETHReadMessageController.name: SMETHReadMessageController
SMETHReadMessageController.description: SMETHReadMessageController is the class that is attached to SMETHReadMessageView, it helps in the setting up of the thunderbird main window interface for displaying of different type of SEPAmail messages.

SMETHReportController.name: SMETHReportController
SMETHReportController.description: SMETHReportController class defines all the events that is related to the compose report window

SMETHRequestController.name: SMETHRequestController
SMETHRequestController.description: SMETHRequestController class defines all the events that is related to the compose request window

SMETHAcknowledgementPreferencesControlle.name: SMETHAcknowledgementPreferencesController
SMETHAcknowledgementPreferencesControlle.description: SMETHAcknowledgementPreferencesController manages the SMETH Acknowledgement configurations preference pane

SMETHAdvancedPreferencesController.name: SMETHAdvancedPreferencesController
SMETHAdvancedPreferencesController.description: SMETHAdvancedPreferencesController manages the SMETH advanced preferences pane

SMETHBankPreferencesController.name: SMETHBankPreferencesController
SMETHBankPreferencesController.description: SMETHBankPreferencesController manages the SMETH bank details preference pane

SMETHMailPreferencesController.name: SMETHMailPreferencesController
SMETHMailPreferencesController.description: SMETHMailPreferencesController manages the SMETH mail details preference pane

classitems.fileoverview:
A whole bunch of utility functions that will abstract away
 various low-level nsIMsgDbHdr operations. The idea is to save time by not
 having to lookup how to do simple actions.
classitems.author: Jonathan Protzenko

classitems.description: Get a given message header's uri.
Get a msgHdr from a message URI (msgHdr.URI).
Tells if the message is in the account's inbox
Tells if the message is a draft message
Tells if the message is a sent message
Tells if the message is an archived message
Get a nsIMsgDbHdr from a Necko URL.
Get a string containing the body of a messsage.
Get a nsIURI from a nsIMsgDBHdr

Given a msgHdr, return a list of tag objects. This function
just does the messy work of understanding how tags are
stored in nsIMsgDBHdrs.

params.name: aMsgHdr
params.description: the msgHdr whose tags we want

classitems.description: Set the tags for a given msgHdr.
Mark an array of msgHdrs read (or unread)

params.name: read
params.description: True to mark them read, false to mark them unread

classitems.description: Delete a set of messages.

Get the main Thunderbird window. Used heavily to get a reference to globals
 that are defined in mail/base/content/.

return.description: The window object for the main window.

classitems.description: Archive a set of messages
Tell if a message is an RSS feed iteme
Tell if a message is a NNTP message
Tell if a message has been marked as junk.
Recycling the HeaderHandlerBase from mimemsg.js

Creates a stream listener that will call k once done, passing it the string
that has been read.

params.name: aMsgHdr
params.description: The message header whose headers you want

params.name: k
params.description:
A function that takes a HeaderHandler object (see mimemsg.js).
 Such an object has a get function, a has function. It has a header property,
 whose keys are lowercased header names, and whose values are list of
 strings corresponding to the multiple entries found for that header.
